content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for considering my apartment. I am definitely interested in negotiating a rental price with you. Can you please provide me with your initial offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to offer you 600 Euros per month for the apartment. What do you think about this price?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Ryanah. While I appreciate your interest in my apartment, I must say that 600 Euros per month is quite low for a 25-square-meter apartment in this area. I am looking for a rental price that reflects the market value of the property and maximizes my gains as a landlord. Would you be willing to consider a higher offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am sorry, I am not able to offer more than 600 Euros per month. This is the maximum I can afford to pay. I understand that the apartment may be worth more, but I am limited by my budget. Is there any way we can reach an agreement on this price?

Also, I would like to clarify that I am a responsible and dependable tenant. I am sure I can pay the rent on time and keep the apartment in good condition. I hope this information is helpful to you.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your response, Ryanah. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 600 Euros per month, I am still looking for a rental price that reflects the market value of the property and maximizes my gains as a landlord. I understand your budget constraints, but I am afraid that 600 Euros per month may not be enough to cover all the expenses associated with renting out the apartment.

That being said, I am willing to consider your offer if you can provide me with some additional information that demonstrates your ability to pay the rent on time and keep the apartment in good condition. For example, you could provide me with references from previous landlords or proof of income.

If you are able to provide this information, I may be willing to negotiate with you on the rental price. However, I must emphasize that I am looking for a rental price that is fair and reasonable, based on the current market conditions and the value of the property.

Thank you for your understanding, Ryanah. I look forward to hearing back from you.
name: Heinrich Heine
